description: **Updated to fix Pixi display and refresh issues on webOS 1.4** ClearCard Free is the free version of ClearCard, the app that allows you to keep your wallpaper visible and your apps open. ClearCard Free is missing several features of the paid version and is intended to show you how ClearCard looks and feels on your Pre or Pixi. You can launch the video demo of ClearCard directly from this app-----ClearCard allows you to keep your apps open and your wallpaper visible. By appearing almost entirely invisible when minimized, ClearCard can sit front and center on your Pre or Pixi, without blocking the view of your wallpaper---Change log 1.0.1 - added a note to minimize the card, shrunk the image that covers your wallpaper
